attributes.action: David Hoare should be removed from his role as Chairman of Ofsted.
attributes.additional_details:
The details of his comments can be found on the following website:

https://www.tes.com/news/school-news/breaking-news/exclusive-ofsted-chairman-describes-underperforming-isle-wight-inbred
attributes.background:
The chairman of Ofsted has recently made insulting, inaccurate, and offensive statements about the Isle of Wight.

These type of statements are not appropriate, especially someone in a senior quasi-government role.   This is hardly the type of action from someone who should be setting standards!
